metadata.Title: CVE-2014-0218 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the URL downloader repositoryin repository/url/lib.php in Moodle through 2.3.11, 2.4.x before 2.4.10,2.5.x before 2.5.6, and 2.6.x before 2.6.3 allows remote attackers toinject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
